name: howler
description: Javascript audio library for the modern web.
author: James Simpson <james@goldfirestudios.com> (http://goldfirestudios.com)

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/howler.core.js -c -m -o dist/howler.core.min.js && uglifyjs src/plugins/howler.spatial.js -c -m -o dist/howler.spatial.min.js && uglifyjs src/plugins/howler.convolver.js -c -m -o dist/howler.convolver.min.js && uglifyjs src/plugins/howler.filter.js -c -m -o dist/howler.filter.min.js && awk 'FNR==1{echo ""}1' dist/howler.core.min.js dist/howler.spatial.min.js dist/howler.filter.min.js dist/howler.convolver.min.js > dist/howler.min.js && awk '(NR>1 "&&" FNR==1){printf ("\n\n")};1' src/howler.core.js src/plugins/howler.spatial.js src/plugins/howler.filter.js src/plugins/howler.convolver.js > dist/howler.js
scripts.release: git tag (pkg get version) && git push && git push origin (pkg get version)
